text: The Democratic Party (Italian: Partito Democratico, PD) is an Italian political party. Its secretary is Elly Schlein. From the birth of the Conte II Cabinet, the Democratic Party formed a coalition with the Five Star Movement. Since 2014, the party has been a member of the Center-left Party of European Socialists group in the European Parliament. == References == Category:2007 establishments in Italy Category:Political parties in Italy
title: Democratic Party (Italy)
